name: The Car Experiment
description:
The Car Experiment is a small prototype I made, experimenting 2 different ways to control an almost arcade-y type of car, using raycasts and wheel colliders.

I was planning on making a game that hasn't been fully thought of yet, but would resemble things such as an opened word car game with lots of suspension. I have the idea I just can't explain it.

I wanted to have people have a feel of the 2 different controllers, and let me know which one they prefer either in the comments, or in my Discord. So if you have a little bit of time, a playtest and feedback would be appreciated.
